    • Method Detail

      • constructBermudanSwaption

        public BermudanSwaption constructBermudanSwaption(double firstFixingDate,
                                                  BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface valuationMethod)
        Method to construct callable Bermudan swaption for testing purposes from reduced input. All fixing dates are exercise dates, equal period length, notional ==1 and constant swaprate
        Parameters:
        firstFixingDate - first fixing date of the swaption
        valuationMethod - valuation method to be used
        Returns:
        A Bermudan Swaption with the given parameters
